attributes.title: Glichy
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep up with my lovely president and his mission to make America great again and then out of nowhere it kept kicking me out and glitching the button options weren’t able to be clicked on I really don’t k ow who designed the app because they did a horrible job

attributes.title: bad app 😨
attributes.review: i was expecting so much more from our lovely president, donny, the bunker boy himself but was VERY disappointed. the overall design was awful and upon opening the app missiles were fired at my house because i texted him and said i’d rather eat my own dick than let a racist, fascist, sexist, demented, homophobic cheeto be president again.

attributes.title: Super bad don’t recommend
attributes.review: This is so terrible. I opened the app and these terrible ads started coming up it really scared me. This app should be taken off the App Store ASAP!!! It keeps lagging and making my whole phone slower. I would never recommend this app to anyone it is terrible.

attributes.title: So MANY GLITCHES
attributes.review: This is NOT it. The app glitches out every time I try to open it. The few times it opens, it asks me to create an account despite already giving my email multiple times. If there was an option for 1 star i would. Also this review is TOTALLY not from t1k t0k.

attributes.title: Great App
attributes.review: This app is really great and I love it also why would we not want to ban tik tok if it is sending personal info to communist China leaders

attributes.title: Ads
attributes.review: So many ads it’s getting quite annoying from time to time it’s okay just not the greatest app ever made in history by a developer, they could have done better but overall I rate this app a one star due to its lack of creativity, and incite for the public.

attributes.title: Viruses
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app my phone wouldn’t turn on unless I tapped the home button 4 time very quickly. Some of my apps won’t even open when pressed. Not to mention all my photos being deleted along with my contacts.

This app is very bad it asked me really dumb questions about democratic stuff and was bashing people it also gave me a question about my race and it wouldn’t let me put black or anything except white this is completely horrible I was just trying to see what his plans were

attributes.title: ✨disappointed✨
attributes.review: this app promised to give me 1 million dollars, find my missing cat, and cure my asthma, but it did none of those things. I am extremely disappointed, and trump will no longer be getting my vote. I just want to find my missing cat. 😿i’m sure bernie could find it 😤

attributes.title: Poorly designed
attributes.review: Was excited to find out about an app that helps me support our wonderful President, but unfortunately I just have to say that it is very underwhelming! The app is slow, looks unprofessional and is over all difficult to use! Will be deleting.
